Version 1.4 Release Notes

  • Move to new website(deezerplayer.net)
  • Splash screen(via Deezer guidelines)
  • Prevent clicking on links while preloading page

Version 1.3 Release Notes

  • Rename project to DeezPlayer
  • New dock icon
  • Less cluttered menu
  • Deactivate application after closing window
  • Allow cmd-tab back to application after closing window

Version 1.2 Release Notes

  • DeezPlayer will autoupdate from now on

Version 1.1 Release Notes

  • Scrolling some UI elements should not longer create glitches
  • Prevent pausing music when closing window
